trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions] Listens for `GL_STOP_LISTENING` notifications from IIS.
trans-unit.target: [Støttes i .NET Framework 4.5.1 og nyere versjoner] Lytter `GL_STOP_LISTENING` varslinger fra IIS.

trans-unit.source: You can implement the IStopListeningRegisteredObject interface by passing an object to the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan implementere grensesnittet IStopListeningRegisteredObject ved å sende et objekt av <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The passed object listens for `GL_STOP_LISTENING` notifications from IIS.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte objektet lytter `GL_STOP_LISTENING` varslinger fra IIS.

trans-unit.source: You can call this implementation when ASP.NET receives a `GL_STOP_LISTENING` notification from IIS, which signals that IIS is no longer listening for new requests for this application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ringe denne implementeringen når ASP.NET mottar en `GL_STOP_LISTENING` varsel fra IIS som signaliserer at IIS er ikke lenger lytte for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: The web server can allow requests that are in progress to run to completion.
trans-unit.target: Nettserveren kan tillate visning av forespørsler som er i ferd med å gjennomføres fullstendig.

trans-unit.source: If your application processes long running requests, you might want to have the application listen for these IIS notifications to gracefully wind down the request.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet prosessene tidkrevende forespørsler, bør du ha lytte programmet for varslene IIS til webområdet du kommer ut forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IStopListeningRegisteredObject.StopListening%2A> method contrasts with the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A> method, which signals immediate application shutdown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IStopListeningRegisteredObject.StopListening%2A>metoden står i kontrast med den <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A>metoden som signaliserer umiddelbar programmet avsluttes.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.IStopListeningRegisteredObject.StopListening%2A>

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions] Stops listening for new requests.
trans-unit.target: [Støttes i .NET Framework 4.5.1 og nyere versjoner] Stopper lytte.

trans-unit.source: The StopListening method is supported only when running in IIS integrated mode.
trans-unit.target: StopListening-metoden støttes bare når du kjører i IIS-integrert modus.

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET runtime does not guarantee that the StopListening method will ever fire.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretiden ASP.NET garantere ikke at metoden StopListening skulle skal aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: The StopListening method must not throw exceptions, otherwise the behavior is undefined and the process will likely be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Metoden StopListening må ikke slette unntak, ellers virkemåten er ikke definert og prosessen sannsynlig vil bli avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: Further, to avoid creating deadlocks, the StopListening method should not block execution.
trans-unit.target: Videre for å unngå å opprette vranglås, må StopListening-metoden ikke blokker kjøring.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > In many applications the StopListening method can run at the same time as the <xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > I mange applikasjoner i StopListening metode kan kjøres samtidig som den <xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>metoden.</xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.AppDomain> unload occurs, the StopListening method might be forcibly aborted before it finishes executing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.AppDomain>fjerning forekommer metoden StopListening kan fremtvinge avbrutt før den avsluttes kjøring.</xref:System.AppDomain>
